Title: Lord-Celestant on Dracoth
Legend: Fuelled by the powers celestial, all Lord-Celestants are formidable warriors in their own right. When allied with the might of a Dracoth, they become all the more potent, tearing asunder all who oppose the God-King.
Intro: A Lord-Celestant on Dracoth is armed with a Sigmarite Thundershield and 1 of the following weapon options: Stormstrike Glaive; Lightning Hammer; Thunderaxe; or Tempestos Hammer.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Lords of the Exemplar Chamber • Lords of the Harbinger Chamber • Lords of the Warrior Chamber

Rules.Name: Mount
Rules.Rule: MOUNT: This unit’s Dracoth is armed with a Stormblast and Claws and Fangs.

Rules.Name: Stormblast
Rules.Fluff: Dracoths can unleash the power of Sigmar’s storm from within their maws.
Rules.Rule: Do not use the attack sequence for an attack made with a Stormblast. Instead, roll a dice. On a 4+, the target suffers D3 mortal wounds.

Rules.Name: Sigmarite Thundershield
Rules.Fluff: When struck with sufficient force, thundershields unleash stored storm energy to blast those attempting to attack.
Rules.Rule: If the unmodified save roll for an attack made with a melee weapon that targets this unit is 6, the attacking unit suffers 1 mortal wound after all of its attacks have been resolved.

Rules.Name: Furious Retribution
Rules.Fluff: Lord-Celestants lead their brethren in assaults upon the enemy lines, breaking the foe beneath their immortal fury.
Rules.Rule: Once per battle, this unit can issue the All-out Attack command to a friendly STORMCAST ETERNALS unit without a command point being spent.

Rules.Name: Impaling Strikes
Rules.Fluff: On the charge, the blade of a stormstrike glaive can impale several foes.
Rules.Rule: This unit’s Stormstrike Glaive has a Damage characteristic of 3 instead of 1 if this unit made a charge move in the same turn.

Rules.Name: Blast To Ashes
Rules.Fluff: A well-swung lightning hammer unleashes its pent-up energies in a great blast, destroying everything it strikes.
Rules.Rule: Blast to Ashes: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Lightning Hammer is 6, the target suffers 2 mortal wounds and the attack sequence ends (do not make a wound or save roll).

Rules.Name: Cleaving Blow
Rules.Fluff: A single swing of a thunderaxe can carve through several foes.
Rules.Rule: Add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of a Thunderaxe if the number of models in the target unit is greater than the number of models in this unit.

Rules.Name: Tempestos Hammer
Rules.Fluff: With the momentum of the charge behind it, the impact of a tempestos hammer can fell a rampaging Ghorgon.
Rules.Rule: Add D3 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s Tempestos Hammer if this unit made a charge move in the same turn.
